languages.text: "И этот про утилизацию... ладно бы ваши мон-кайские угрозы хоть как-то отличались. Но даже в этом вашей фантазии хватает лишь на банальное обещание безвременной кончины".
"'Disposal'... Your mon-keigh threats could at least use some variety. But even there, your imagination goes no further than a trite promise of premature demise."
languages.original_text: "И этот про утилизацию... ладно бы ваши мон-кайские угрозы хоть как-то отличались. Но даже в этом вашей фантазии хватает лишь на банальное обещание безвременной кончины".

traits.locale_text: "This one's talking about recycling too... Your mon-keigh threats could at least use some variety. But even there, your imagination goes no further than a trite promise of eternal demise."
"This one's talking about recycling too... Your mon-keigh threats could at least use some variety. But even there, your imagination goes no further than a trite promise of eternal demise."
"This one's talking about recycling too... Your mon-keigh threats could at least use some variety. But even there, your imagination goes no further than a trite promise of eternal demise."
"This one's talking about recycling too... Your mon-keigh threats could at least use some variety. But even there, your imagination goes no further than a trite promise of eternal demise."
"'Disposal'... Your mon-keigh threats could at least use some variety. But even there, your imagination goes no further than a trite promise of premature demise."
"'Disposal'... Your mon-keigh threats could at least use some variety. But even there, your imagination goes no further than a trite promise of premature demise."

languages.text: «"Eliminación"... Deberíais añadir un poco de variedad a vuestras amenazas, mon-keigh. Incluso así, vuestra imaginación es incapaz de superar una trivial promesa de muerte prematura».
languages.original_text: "'Disposal'... Your mon-keigh threats could at least use some variety. But even there, your imagination goes no further than a trite promise of premature demise."

traits.locale_text: «"Eliminación"... Deberíais añadir un poco de variedad a vuestras amenazas, mon-keigh. Incluso así, vuestra imaginación es incapaz de superar una trivial promesa de muerte prematura».

languages.text: “‘处置’……你这只猴子的威胁，真该换些花样才对。不过就凭你的想象力，估计也只能想得用‘死’来威胁别人了，真够无聊的。”
languages.original_text: "'Disposal'... Your mon-keigh threats could at least use some variety. But even there, your imagination goes no further than a trite promise of premature demise."

traits.locale_text: “‘处置’……你这只猴子的威胁，真该换些花样才对。不过就凭你的想象力，估计也只能想得用‘死’来威胁别人了，真够无聊的。”

languages.text: 「『処分』…モン＝ケイの脅迫は少なくとももう少しバラエティに富んでいたはずだ。それが、とっとと死ぬことになるということには想像力が至らないようだなぁ」
languages.original_text: "'Disposal'... Your mon-keigh threats could at least use some variety. But even there, your imagination goes no further than a trite promise of premature demise."

traits.locale_text: 「『処分』…モン＝ケイの脅迫は少なくとももう少しバラエティに富んでいたはずだ。それが、とっとと死ぬことになるということには想像力が至らないようだなぁ」

languages.text: « Élimination ? Peuh, vos menaces de mon-keigh sont d'une platitude consternante. Hélas, même dans ce domaine, votre imagination se limite à une banale promesse de mort prématurée. »
languages.original_text: "'Disposal'... Your mon-keigh threats could at least use some variety. But even there, your imagination goes no further than a trite promise of premature demise."

traits.locale_text: « Élimination ? Peuh, vos menaces de mon-keigh sont d'une platitude consternante. Hélas, même dans ce domaine, votre imagination se limite à une banale promesse de mort prématurée. »

languages.text: "'İmha'... Mon-keigh tehditleriniz, en azından biraz çeşitlilik gösterebilirdi. Gerçi çeşitli olsa bile hayal gücünüz, vaktinden evvel gelen bayağı bir ecel vaadinden öteye gitmiyor."
languages.original_text: "'Disposal'... Your mon-keigh threats could at least use some variety. But even there, your imagination goes no further than a trite promise of premature demise."

traits.locale_text: "'İmha'... Mon-keigh tehditleriniz, en azından biraz çeşitlilik gösterebilirdi. Gerçi çeşitli olsa bile hayal gücünüz, vaktinden evvel gelen bayağı bir ecel vaadinden öteye gitmiyor."

languages.text: "Entsorgung ... Eure Chem-Pan-Sey-Drohungen könnten ein wenig Abwechslung vertragen. Aber Eure Fantasie geht über das banale Versprechen eines vorzeitigen Ablebens nicht hinaus."
languages.original_text: "'Disposal'... Your mon-keigh threats could at least use some variety. But even there, your imagination goes no further than a trite promise of premature demise."

traits.locale_text: "Entsorgung ... Eure Chem-Pan-Sey-Drohungen könnten ein wenig Abwechslung vertragen. Aber Eure Fantasie geht über das banale Versprechen eines vorzeitigen Ablebens nicht hinaus."
